The claim was posted on Facebook by an A: based user on July 26, 2020, and has been shared more than 170 times.
A purported screenshot included in the F: year-old woman contracted pleurisy after wearing a face mask for eight hours a day, five or six days a week.
Health experts: including Dr. Leon van den Toorn and Dr. Hans in ‘t Veen, have dismissed the claim as false and stated that there is no indication that face masks carry any health risk.
